div.h5: “I feel very fortunate to be a parent and also en educator in the Minnewaska Area School district. The staff and administration at Minnewaska Area are dedicated and passionate about every student's education as well as building personal and meaningful relationships with the entire student body!”

img.alt: Brian Gruber, Teacher and Parent at Minnewaska Area Schools

div.h5: “I love the Minnewaska school and community!”
div.p: As a Minnewaska alumna and now a parent and teacher in the district, there is nowhere I would rather live, work, and raise our family. We are small enough to be a family, yet large enough to offer many exciting educational opportunities. The Minnewaska staff are dedicated to providing an engaging learning experience that grows each child academically as well as helping students to become contributing, positive citizens in our school and community.

img.alt: Jennifer Erickson, Teacher at Minnewaska Area Schools

div.h5: “My favorite activities at Minnewaska Area Schools are playing outside with my friends and singing in Ms. Listerud's class.”
